ValidationRule.description: Force the related Reference PAC.Penalty & Interest Assessed value via the Penalty & Interest Assessed link field to have a value greater than zero in order to save a Reference PAC Warranty/Late Payment record where the Payment Type = Warranty.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ($RecordType.Name = "PAC Warranty Record Type"), (ISPICKVAL(Payment_Type__c, 'Warranty')), ( (NOT(Penalty_Interest_Assessed_link__c > 0)) || ISNULL(Penalty_Interest_Assessed_link__c ) ), ($Profile.Name <>"System Administrator") )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: P&I assessment field on related Reference PAC record is zero or blank and needs to be updated before requesting warranty.
